title: The {AFRL} {WMT}19 Systems: Old Favorites and New Tricks
authors:
Gwinnup, Jeremy  and
Erdmann, Grant  and
Anderson, Tim
venue: Proceedings of the Fourth Conference on Machine Translation (Volume 2: Shared Task Papers, Day 1)
abstract: This paper describes the Air Force Research Laboratory (AFRL) machine translation systems and the improvements that were developed during the WMT19 evaluation campaign. This year, we refine our approach to training popular neural machine translation toolkits, experiment with a new domain adaptation technique and again measure improvements in performance on the Russianâ€“English language pair.
